info.description: External RESTful APIs to access DUPR ratings, users and provide matches.
info.title: DUPR APIs

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: Authenticate using client secret and key to get access token.

tags.name: Club
tags.description: Resources to access DUPR Club data.

tags.name: Match
tags.description: Resources to access DUPR match data.

tags.name: Player
tags.description: Resources to access DUPR Player data.

tags.name: Player Rating
tags.description: Resources to access DUPR Player rating data.

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Resources to access DUPR user's data.

post.description: Use provided client key and secret to generate short lived access token. Access token is mandatory to use all the other resources.
This API provide ratings of all members of the club.
This API displays the match history for the specified player
This API allow to create a matches in bulk. It returns unique match ids in response in same order as they were sent.
This API allow to create a match. It returns unique match id in response.

delete.description: This API allows to delete an existing match.

post.description: This API allows a client to update a match by its ID.

post.summary: Pre-generate a dupr ID and invite a user to join
Get the provisional rating for a player
Set the provisional rating for a player

delete.summary: Delete the provisional rating for a player

post.summary: Set the provisional rating for a player

post.description: This API does full-text search on user names and it returns user full names and respective DUPR IDs

get.description: This API provides details like full name, singles and doubles ratings with provisional ratings flags. It requires DUPR ID as an input.

get.summary: Retrieve the club membership for a user by DUPR Id

post.description: This API provide ratings of all members of the club.
Finds the Player's DUPR ID based on Email.

get.description: Return a list of Players based on the client.

post.description:
This API receives a list of Player ids and relates the Client and the Player, after any
                rating change on the player, the client will receive a request in the webhook endpoint.

delete.description: This API receives a list of Player ids and removes the relationship between it with the Client.

max.description: Maximum age value of a user

min.description: Minimum age value of a user

identifier.description: An unique identifier for this match

matchCode.description: An unique match code returned at time of creation

address.description: Street level address in format county / city, state / region, country

radiusInMeters.description: Radius distance in meters from the point of provided latitude and longitude, default is 40233.6 meters (25 miles)

bracket.description: Bracket name in which this match was played

event.description: Event name in which this match was played

extras.description: Extra parameters in key value pairs

identifier.description: An unique identifier for this match

matchDate.description: Match date must be in ISO 8061 format date i.e. yyyy-MM-dd

matchSource.description: The source of the match; see the enum array for allowed values

matchType.description: MatchTypes can be a value between RALLY or SIDEOUT

endDate.description: The end date in epoch seconds

startDate.description: The start date in epoch seconds

player2.description: DUPR ID of player 2, in case of singles it can be null

max.description: Maximum value of user ratings can be up to 8.0

min.description: Minimum value of user ratings can be down to 2.0

reliable.description: Ratings should be reliable or not, by default null which means it is not considered

type.description: Type of ratings to apply min and max values, one of the value from following array.

gender.description: Value must be exact match from the following array.

location.description: Latitude and longitude of a place with radius to filter by approximate area

limit.description: Number of results in a page

query.description: User full or partial name to get details

bracket.description: Bracket name in which this match was played

event.description: Event name in which this match was played

extras.description: Extra parameters in key value pairs

identifier.description: An unique identifier for this match

matchDate.description: Match date must be in ISO 8061 format date i.e. yyyy-MM-dd

matchSource.description: Match source can be a value between CLUB or DUPR

matchType.description: MatchTypes can be a value between RALLY or SIDEOUT

doublesHalfLife.description: The doubles half life for the user, if available

provisionalRatings.description: The provisional rating for the user, if available

singlesHalfLife.description: The singles half life for the user, if available

formattedAddress.example: 5800 PA-378, Center Valley, PA 18034, United States
